name: Villain (Raffile)
description:
Villain is a funny single-player game, about a character who even though tries his best to be evil can't quite cut it. Join Futilis in his adventure against cops, vigilantes, and heroes as he shoots and slashes his way to achieve his master plan. The Meltdown.

Created for https://itch.io/jam/gbjam-8
